TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapBodyBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

summary.span: 表示添加到 或 的扩展性元素。

span.span: Represents an extensibility element added to an or an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类指定消息（抽象类型定义或具体架构定义）在传输的 SOAP 正文元素中的显示方式。This class specifies how messages, either abstract type definitions or concrete schema definitions, appear within the SOAP body element of the transmission. 有关为 XML Web services 指定协议的详细信息，请参阅 [使用 ASP.NET 的 Xml Web services](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ba0z6a33(v=vs.100))。For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [XML Web Services Using ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ba0z6a33(v=vs.100)). 有关 Web Services 描述语言 (WSDL) 的详细信息，请参阅 [wsdl](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) 规范。For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CPP/soapoperationbinding.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CS/soapoperationbinding.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/VB/soapoperationbinding.vb#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Encoding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Encoding : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串包含由空格分隔的 URI 的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a string containing a list of space-delimited URIs.

summary.span: 这些 URI 表示用来对 SOAP 体中的消息进行编码的编码样式。

span.span: The URIs represent the encoding style (or styles) to be used to encode messages within the SOAP body.

value.span: 包含 URI 列表的字符串。

span.span: A string containing a list of URIs.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当属性的值为时，才应设置此属性的值 `Encoded` 。The value of this property should be set only if the value of the property is `Encoded`. 否则，将忽略此属性值。Otherwise this property value will be ignored. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CPP/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CS/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/VB/soapbindingstyle_rpc.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Namespace : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 URI，该 URI 表示 属性未具体定义的内容编码规范的位置。

span.span: Get or sets the URI representing the location of the specifications for encoding of content not specifically defined by the property.

value.span: 包含一个 URI 的字符串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未设置属性值，则此属性将返回空字符串 ( "" ) 。This property will return an empty string ("") if the property value has not been set. 仅当属性的值为时，才应设置该值 `Encoded` 。The value should only be set if the value of the property is `Encoded`. 否则，该属性值将被忽略，因此 XML Web service 会导致意外的行为。Otherwise the property value will be ignored, thus leading to unexpected behavior by the XML Web service. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CPP/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CS/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cs#4)] [!code-vb[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/VB/soapbindingstyle_rpc.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ Parts { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.Parts : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示传输的消息的哪些部分出现在该传输的 SOAP 体部分。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which parts of the transmitted message appear within the SOAP body portion of the transmission.

value.span: 包含适当消息部分的名称的字符串数组。

span.span: A string array containing the names of the appropriate message parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传输的消息的某些部分可以出现在 SOAP 正文之外的部分中，例如当 SOAP 与一起使用时 。Some parts of the transmitted message can appear in portions other than the SOAP body, such as when SOAP is used with a . 在这种情况下，属性的其他成员 确定消息的其他部分的位置。In such a case, the other members of the property determine the locations of the other parts of the message. 此属性返回的信息与属性完全相同 ，但结果在数组中返回，而不是以空格分隔字符串的形式返回。This property returns exactly the same information as the property, but the results are returned within an array rather than within a space-delimited string. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBodyBinding_Parts/CPP/soapbodybinding_parts.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBodyBinding_Parts/CS/soapbodybinding_parts.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBodyBinding_Parts/VB/soapbodybinding_parts.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PartsString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PartsString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示传输的消息的哪些部分出现在该传输的 SOAP 体部分。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which parts of the transmitted message appear within the SOAP body portion of the transmission.

value.span: 包含适当消息部分的由空格分隔的字符串。

span.span: A space-delimited string containing the appropriate message parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传输的消息的某些部分可以出现在 SOAP 正文之外的部分中，例如当 SOAP 与一起使用时 。Some parts of the transmitted message can appear in portions other than the SOAP body, such as when SOAP is used with a . 在这种情况下，属性的其他成员 确定消息其他部分的位置。In such a case, the other members of the property determine the locations of other parts of the message. 此属性返回的信息与属性完全相同 ，但结果在以空格分隔的字符串中返回，而不是在数组中返回。This property returns exactly the same information as the property, but the results are returned within a space-delimited string rather than within an array. PartsString 在内部用于 xml 序列化，不应直接调用。PartsString is used internally for xml serialization and shouldn't be called directly. 若要返回传输的 SOAP 正文部分中出现的传输消息部分，请使用 属性。To return the transmitted message parts appearing within the SOAP body portion of the transmission, use the property. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CPP/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CS/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/VB/soapfaultbinding_ctor.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse Use { System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse value); };

summary.span: 指示消息部分是使用指定的编码规则进行编码还是定义消息的具体架构。

span.span: Indicates whether the message parts are encoded using specified encoding rules, or define the concrete schema of the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性依赖于此属性的值。The and properties depend on the value of this property. 仅当此属性的值为时，才应设置其值 `Encoded` 。Their values should be set only if the value of this property is `Encoded`. 否则，XML Web service 将产生意外行为。Otherwise the XML Web service will produce unexpected behavior. ## Examples SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding # 9SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#9
